title: PipeRider
section-hero-img-alt: Photo by Kevin Bhagat on Unsplash
section-hero-content: Pipeline-wide Change Management for datasets, experiments, models, and deployments.
section-intro:
PipeRider is a data change management solution for datasets, experiments, models, and deployments
throughout all your pipelines, so you can:

  • Build scalable applications with the most up-to-date datasets and models.
  • Reuse, donâ€™t duplicate, the complex pipelines for different projects.
  • See all the data change occurrences from any source in a single status report.
section-secondary-content: Bring all the metadata together from any tool your team uses and get a clear understanding of all data flows, updates, sources, transformations, and dependencies..
section-third-title: Track, Trace and Search for Data Change Occurrences
section-third-content: Keep track of any changes in code, training data, experiment metrics, Python dependencies, and everything in between, and search them with simple queries, in one single source.
section-why-title-1: This is helpful if YOU ARE:
section-why-title-2: This is helpful if YOU WANT TO:
section-why-content-1:
• Frustrated keeping track of your data changes on spreadsheets or paper.
  • Tired of working with multiple pipelines and datasets scattered all over the place.
  • Spending unnecessary time and resources on duplicated models or pipelines.
section-why-content-2:
• Share the most up-to-date datasets, models, and experiment results across teams.
  • Understand the dependency between datasets and models in your experiments.
  • Build and scale your pipelines across multiple teams.
section-fourth-title: Get Real-time Notifications on Any Data Changes
section-fourth-content: Subscribe to events for metadata changes and trigger workflow actions from existing tools such as TensorBoard, Weights & Bias, MLFlow.
